mapper.insert: insert into reply(rno, bno, userId, reply_content) values(sqs_reply.nextval, #{bno}, #{userId}, #{reply_content})
mapper.update: update reply set reply_content=#{reply_content}, userId=#{userId}, reply_updateDate = sysdate where rno=#{rno}
mapper.select: select rno, bno, reply_content, userid, reply_Date, reply_updateDate from reply where bno=#{bno} order by rno asc
